nz.wicker.bmad.general

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.wicker.bmad.general.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends Object
    Some basic String manipulation stuff, that seems somehow infeasible in standard java without giant external libraries.

      • mkString

        public static String mkString(Iterable<?> it,
                              String prefix,
                              String separator,
                              String suffix)
        Composes a String from the prefix, elements of an Iterable separated by the separator, and the suffix.
        Parameters:
        it - the Iterable to compose the String of.
        prefix - the prefix to start the String with.
        separator - the sepearator for composing.
        suffix - the suffix to end the string with.
        Returns:
        the resulting String.

      • pow

        public static String pow(String str,
                         int n)
        Power-function in the free Monoid over Characters (AKA "Strings").
        Parameters:
        str - the String to repeat.
        n - how often the string is repeated.
        Returns:
        tge resulting string.
